admissionProcess: Admission to Dhaka University is based on a rigorous entrance exam and academic performance. Candidates must submit their application online and appear for the entrance exam on the scheduled date.

events.eventDetails: Orientation Day welcomes new students and provides an introduction to campus life and academic programs.
Cultural Fest features various cultural performances, including music, dance, and drama.
Sports Carnival includes inter-departmental sports competitions and friendly matches.

sportsCategories.sportDetails: Football is a popular sport at Dhaka University. The university has a football team and conducts various football tournaments.
Cricket enthusiasts can participate in the university's cricket team and compete in inter-university matches.
Badminton courts are available for students to play friendly matches and participate in badminton competitions.

collegeName: Bangladesh University of Engineering and Technology (BUET)
admissionProcess: Admission to BUET is highly competitive and requires a specialized engineering entrance exam. Eligible candidates must submit their application online and appear for the admission test, which includes written and practical exams.

events.eventDetails: Tech Expo showcases innovative projects and research initiatives by BUET students.
Engineering Week features workshops, seminars, and guest lectures on various engineering topics.
BUET Cultural Night showcases various cultural performances, art, and traditional displays.

sportsCategories.sportDetails: Cricket enthusiasts can participate in regular cricket tournaments and practice sessions organized by the university.
BUET has a swimming pool where students can enjoy swimming and participate in swimming competitions.
Table tennis facilities are available for students to enjoy friendly matches and participate in table tennis competitions.

admissionProcess: Rajshahi University conducts an entrance exam, and the admission process also considers academic records. Candidates must apply online and attend the entrance exam as per the announced schedule.

events.eventDetails: Freshers' Reception welcomes new students and provides them with a warm welcome to the university.
Science Fair showcases scientific projects and research conducted by students from various departments.
Cultural Program features performances from various cultural groups and celebrates diversity and artistic talents.

sportsCategories.sportDetails: Football is a popular sport at Rajshahi University. The university has a football team and conducts various football tournaments.
Volleyball courts are available for students to play friendly matches and participate in volleyball competitions.
Chess enthusiasts can participate in chess tournaments and friendly matches organized by the university.

admissionProcess: Chittagong University's admission process includes a written test and a viva voce. Candidates must apply online and appear for the written test on the specified date.

events.eventDetails: Orientation Program introduces new students to the university, its facilities, and the academic environment.
CU Annual Fest features various cultural events, music, dance, drama, and art performances.
Sports Championship includes competitive sports tournaments and fosters a spirit of healthy competition among students.

sportsCategories.sportDetails: Football is a popular sport at Chittagong University. The university has a football team and conducts various football tournaments.
Cricket enthusiasts can participate in regular cricket tournaments and practice sessions organized by the university.
Chittagong University has a basketball court where students can enjoy friendly matches and participate in basketball competitions.

admissionProcess: Jahangirnagar University's admission process involves a written test and a viva voce. Candidates must apply online and appear for the admission test on the specified date.

events.eventDetails: Freshers' Welcome introduces new students to the university and its academic and extracurricular activities.
Arts Festival showcases artistic talents of students, including painting, photography, and creative writing.
Inter-Department Sports include various sports competitions, promoting a healthy and active lifestyle.

sportsCategories.sportDetails: Football is a popular sport at Jahangirnagar University. The university has a football team and conducts various football tournaments.
Cricket enthusiasts can participate in regular cricket tournaments and practice sessions organized by the university.
Jahangirnagar University has a hockey field where students can enjoy friendly matches and participate in hockey competitions.

admissionProcess: Khulna University conducts an admission test to select eligible candidates. Candidates must apply online and appear for the admission test as per the announced schedule.

events.eventDetails: Orientation Week introduces new students to the university, its faculties, and various support services.
Cultural Night features performances representing the cultural diversity of students and staff.
Annual Sports Meet includes a range of sports activities, promoting physical fitness and teamwork.

sportsCategories.sportDetails: Football is a popular sport at Khulna University. The university has a football team and conducts various football tournaments.
Cricket enthusiasts can participate in regular cricket tournaments and practice sessions organized by the university.
